Wilmington.Mount Lebanon Methodist Episcopal Church: Mount Lebanon Methodist Episcopal Church, also known as Mount Lebanon United Methodist Church, is a historic Methodist Episcopal church located at 850 Mount Lebanon Road in Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware. It was built in 1834, and is a stuccoed stone structure in a Late Gothic Revival style. It measures 60 feet by 40 feet, and has a steep gable roof and frame vestibule added in 1873.
